message: Hi, we offer a new way of brainstorming ideas for domain names. See related terms, translations, variations, social feeds, and more. The site is http://www.panabee.com. We would appreciate any feedback! Thanks in advance!
your site doesnt work properly it says some domains are free when they are not.

I know for 100% that one domain that came up is not free because i tried to buy it from the person last week. Also other domains i tried were not available>
so i am not sure where you are getting your data from.

But i do like the names that pop out
Also just checked out a domain I own and it says its free. Hmm i dont think your .io domains are working. and .com is not working 100%
if you can register a pure .ck send me a message i got 2 i want to register

Also .ck does not exist from what i can see

there is .co.ck
.gov.ck
cute mascot
The app definitely has some issues in recommending impossible domains, but generally speaking,  it's pretty awesome.
Thanks for all the feedback. @newstart, could you please share some of the .COM and .IO domains that were wrong? We will look into them. Sorry for the mistakes!
Not going to share my domain but stock.io came up as free. It isn't I tried to buy it. Stocko.com came up as free it's taken
It's never not worked for me.
This web page is not available google chrome will not load your page.  I've never been able to load it.
@panabee I meant it has never worked for, Not even when i clicked from the google link

@bmelton and @marklaviolette ... could you try again please? It should work. Not sure why the server was down last night, but we'll check the logs. Thanks. Thanks, @newstart. We'll look into these bugs.

This web page is not available
The web page at http://www.panabee.com/ might be temporarily down or it may have moved permanently to a new web address.
Here are some suggestions:
Reload this web page later.
Error 101 (net::ERR_CONNECTION_RESET): The connection was reset.
@MarkLaViolette, hmmm, it's working now for us and others (and has been all day). Could you try again please? Sorry about this. This is very puzzling.
@newstart, thanks for the bugs! We fixed them all we think.  The ones you mentioned all display the correct status now.  Please let us know if you find more improperly marked domains!
I'm not sure if the "Wikipedia Related Terms" section works.
@glorithm, you mean it's buggy or you mean it doesn't help? How about the rest? Thanks for the feedback!
@panabee -- It's always worked for me.
Sorry, misread the message @bmelton. Did it help?
love your logo ;]
It works for me on my work PC. will have to let you know from my home pc later on. :)
@panabee For example, I typed in "beer" and under the wikipedia section, I saw terms like "July 24" and "XXX"...
May be to change the algorithm?
@Panabee There was nothing to help.   It's always worked.
Sorry, @bmelton. I meant, did our site help you brainstorm new domain names?
@glorithm, you're right. The Wiki stuff is hit or miss. We retrieve what Wikipedia believes are relevant terms and have little control over that algorithm. Otherwise, was our site helpful?
Thanks, @nosebleed. Did the site help?
It's cool, I would like more variations. Nameboy usually spits out 4 - 6 pages of names. Your UI is good.

@panabee the translation piece is nice, but since you are doing domain search, may be tighty up the page?  In terms of the wikipedia one, try top 20 with some sort of javascript link/icon to expand the list by the user?
@panabee I got a new router and can now access your site. How weird is that.  Nice looking site.
Thanks @glorithm. Which sections would you remove? Thanks, @MarkLaViolette! Could you please help us spread the word and FB like the site? Thanks!
@Panabee Check Quora.com and find Adam Rifkin.  He is possibly someone who can help you spread the word about Panabee.com.  I think your site is cool.  GL
thanks @Energypanacea!
New app launching soon in NYC looking for early adopters with digital content: http://igobubble.com/content
@Energypanacea, we tried Adam, but no response. Maybe he'll listen to you. :)
@Energypanacea, either way, would you mind FB liking the site please? There are buttons all over the http://www.panabee.com site. Thanks. :)
Great service!
Geez! I must say that panabee.com is really great! Good job! I'll test it more for my next domains, but at first sight the suggested variations are impressive
thanks, @mediumBLACK!
http://mashable.com/2011/04/20/panabee/ techcrunch post on you guys!

@Panabee Sure, I'll do both.  As you can see, Adam would be a good match.  However, it is tough to get his attention.  Maybe you could try him at http://meetup.com/106miles.  Twitter?  Maybe sent him a tee shirt?  GL
Gratz on Mashable post!
@panabee I wouldn't remove anything at the moment, but stream line each widgets into smaller but expandable would be nice.
@jimisir TC hasn't covered us yet, but maybe if enough people mention panabee, they will. :)
thanks @Energypanacea!
thanks @glorithm for the message, and for the suggestion. collapsing/expanding is on the road map. thanks again!
@panabee, my bad. I meant to write mashable. :)
@panabee congrats on the success!
thanks @hallowayillustration. did the service help?
nice.
thanks @ejovi!
@ccarnino, thanks for the message. we didn't do anything special for the mashable coverage. they saw the love convore users were giving us and liked the product and decided to cover panabee.com.
@panabee Tnx! That's a great satisfaction ;)
@panabee I haven't had to use it yet, but i know people who do. Definitely going to mention it to them
I just tried it and it works well for me, really nice. I have 1 question though... do you make money with the site? if so... how?
Cool, thanks @nosebleed. Please help us spread the word. We'll work on more and better variations.
